mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id, u.nickname AS NAME, u.userCode AS loginname, u.password AS password, r.id AS roleId, r.`name` AS roleName, o.id AS organization_id, o.orgName AS org_name, m.id AS member_id, m.memberName AS member_name, p.id AS position_id, p.name AS position_name FROM crm_user u LEFT JOIN crm_member m ON u.memberId = m.id AND m.isdel = #{paramMap.isdel} LEFT JOIN crm_organization o ON m.organizationId = o.id AND o.isdel = #{paramMap.isdel} LEFT JOIN crm_position_user pu ON pu.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN crm_position p ON pu.positionId = p.id AND p.isdel = #{paramMap.isdel} LEFT JOIN crm_role_user ru ON ru.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN crm_role r ON r.id = ru.roleId AND r.isdel = #{paramMap.isdel} WHERE u.state = #{paramMap.state} AND u.isdel = #{paramMap.isdel} AND u.userCode = #{paramMap.userCode}
